header_text: In between appointments, you have time to grab lunch at a cafe that's on the way. When you walk in, you see that most people are sitting with a friend, but you don't have anybody to eat with. You decide that it's normal to eat alone, and you end up enjoying your meal.

elements.Text: Does eating alone make you upset?

elements.name: In between appointments, you have time to grab lunch at a cafe that's on the way.
